ygData.subject: Where can I find Greater Heal?!
ygData.msgSnippet: OK last night I searched the Hall of Truth and the cleric guild in Freeport and Can-Not-Find the stupid greater heal spell.  I just ran all the way from South
ygData.messageBody:
OK last night I searched the Hall of Truth and the cleric guild in Freeport
and Can-Not-Find the stupid greater heal spell. I just ran all the way from
South Karana and before I ran allll the way back to Qeynos, I just need to
know if the greater heal spell can be found in Qeynos. Anyone knows? Also,
maybe there is a vendor hidden somewhere in the cleric guild and I wasn't
able to find him/her in Freeport...can the greater heal spell be found in
Freeport at all? Help.

-Imogen the frustrated
